item.title: My fisrt scrpit
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

[quote=“sonny bill 9, post:2, topic:148028”]ok thats going to put the message in the debug box of scar you should put [code]{
Alex’s Auto-Talker
to use change ‘Message Here’ to your massage
to change the timing change wait(1000) to the time you want (in MM)
this is my first scar script
}

program AutoTalker;
{.include/srl/srl.scar}//you may need to download srl but this is the include so we can use typesend

const
autoer=‘Message Here’;

procedure AutoTalker;
begin
wait(1000)
typesend(autoer);//makes it come in runescape and types slowly
end;

begin
activateclient;//makes the client (usually runescape pop up)
repeat
AutoTalker;
until(false)
end.[/code]
but that will get you banned if you use it to much so you could put

procedure autotalker;
begin
TypeSend(humanText( autoer, Chance))
      else
       TypeSend(autoer);
wait(waittime) 
end;

as procedure autotalker,and insted of repeat autotalker until(false) you could haverepeat autotalker until(isfkeydown(10))to make it stop when you press f10

note:if you have scar 3.12c then go file>>download srl and then file>>download includes but if you have a different scar go to srl-forums.com hope i helped
ps. try following my tutoriul on how to make a powerminer (click here)[/quote]

Lol. The first one won’t get you banned, just make the Wait(1000) Wait(1000+(random500)) and you can’t be banned… Typesend is an srl function which is designed to well NOT get you banned.

Read full topic

item.title: My fisrt scrpit
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

ok thats going to put the message in the debug box of scar you should put [code]{
Alex’s Auto-Talker
to use change ‘Message Here’ to your massage
to change the timing change wait(1000) to the time you want (in MM)
this is my first scar script
}

program AutoTalker;
{.include/srl/srl.scar}//you may need to download srl but this is the include so we can use typesend

const
autoer=‘Message Here’;

procedure AutoTalker;
begin
wait(1000)
typesend(autoer);//makes it come in runescape and types slowly
end;

begin
activateclient;//makes the client (usually runescape pop up)
repeat
AutoTalker;
until(false)
end.[/code]
but that will get you banned if you use it to much so you could put

procedure autotalker;
begin
TypeSend(humanText( autoer, Chance))
      else
       TypeSend(autoer);
wait(waittime) 
end;

as procedure autotalker,and insted of repeat autotalker until(false) you could haverepeat autotalker until(isfkeydown(10))to make it stop when you press f10

note:if you have scar 3.12c then go file>>download srl and then file>>download includes but if you have a different scar go to srl-forums.com hope i helped
ps. try following my tutoriul on how to make a powerminer (click here)

Read full topic

item.title: My fisrt scrpit
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

just started today here you go

[code]{
Alex’s Auto-Talker
to use change ‘Message Here’ to your massage
to change the timing change wait(1000) to the time you want (in MM)
this is my first scar script
}

program AutoTalker;

const
autoer=‘Message Here’;

procedure AutoTalker;
begin
wait(1000)
Writeln(autoer)
end;

begin
repeat
AutoTalker;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
